items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars !!!!! Beautiful Summer Maxi Dress !!!!!.
items.body: !!!!! Beautiful Dress !!!! Look Beautiful As The Picture, I Got This Nice Style Before In A Different Colors And A Different Prints, I Love Them All But This White With The Beautiful Colorful Flowers Is Gorgeous, Size Medium Fit Pretty Good, I Like The Adjustable Straps And The Comfortable Side Pockets, It Is Well Made, Nice Lightweight Material, Great Value For The Money, Thank You For The Nice Early Delivered !!!!!. items.author: Estela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Comfortable, and Flowy â€“ A Summer Must-Have
items.body: The BessCops Summer Maxi Dress is a standout piece in my wardrobe. It has an excellent fit thatâ€™s both comfortable and incredibly flattering â€” it genuinely makes me look and feel slimmer. The fabric has a beautiful flow and movement, giving the dress an effortless, graceful vibe thatâ€™s perfect for warm-weather outings. Whether youâ€™re dressing it up or keeping it casual, this maxi dress offers style, comfort, and confidence in one. I absolutely love the floetry and silhouette. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a chic and flattering summer dress. Read more
items.author: E. Lucas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful dress, just two sizes more than listed on the chart.
items.body: This dress is beautiful. The material quality is soft and it flows well. The colors are vibrant and eye catching. It is slightly see though, so be sure to wear your knickers. The fabric weight is very light. The only issue is, the size is larger than listed by nearly two sizes. Read more
items.author: KenW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love a long dress? This one is FABULOUS!
items.body: Oh this dress is just fabulous! It is way to long for me at 5'3" 148lbs. I adjusted the straps and knotted the corners at each side, which affects how flowy it is. But it's wearable without me tripping. I loved it so much I bought it in the green and the blue, but with smalls instead of mediums. I think with less length and adjusting the straps, I won't have to knot the others. I will probably have this hemmed. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Lane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, soft and comfy
items.body: It's what I expected, fits really comfortable Read more
items.author: Sunshine De Roche

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Long Dress
items.body: This dress is beautiful and the quality is good but it is very very long. I'm 5'4 and the dress pools on the ground around my feet. The only way I can wear this dress is if I tie up the bottom or pay to have it altered. Had I known it was so long I would not have purchased it. Its disappointing because I really love the style and look of the dress. Read more
items.author: Daisy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Dress is super cute. Love the colors! Itâ€™s floor length. Iâ€™m 5â€™8 and 180 lbs. and ordered a large. It flows in the right places and of course, love the pockets. I paired it with a cute pair of wedges and it almost sweeps the floor. Read more
items.author: Cheron Pritchard

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Colorful
items.body: Absolutely love this dress. So comfortable and with the adjustable straps you can go from conservative to sexy easily. Even betterâ€¦ it has pockets!!! The fabric is a little thicker than I anticipated but still comfortable. The color is vibrant and true to the photo depicted. Has as decent amount of stretch around the bosom. Iâ€™m definitely buying more. Once I find something I like, I want one in every available color. lol Read more
items.author: Melissa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 34floral, 32purple, 45orange, 32light Green, 45rose, 45blue, 50floral01, 50floral02, Floral837, 50floral04, 32floral, 50floral05, 32royal Blue, 50floral06. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
